comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/534.30 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/12.0.742.112 Safari/534.30

Steps to reproduce:

It's rather request than a bug, using xul:browser inside panels will give the ability to open rich panels, not taking focus from the user and transparent HTMLs.
